prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish with long tentacles and vibrant colors.
I want a unique aquatic creature with a round, colorful body and flowing appendages.
Generate a jellyfish-inspired Pokemon with striking blue and red hues for its tentacles.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of a sea creature and a mystical being, perfect for ocean battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a translucent body, with red and blue patterns, floating gracefully in the sea.
Design a creature that thrives in underwater environments, showcasing beautiful colors and an intriguing shape.
Give me a Pokemon that captures the essence of the ocean with its jellyfish-like form and vivid coloration.
